specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was good, its Qliphoth counter has decreased.
When the work result was bad, its Qliphoth counter has decreased.
The music that $0 plays when it escapes consists of 4 movements. As the movement goes on, employees suffer White damage, and the music’s area of effect continues to expand.

With each movement, the weakness of $0 changed. For movement 1, it was Pale, while for movement 2, it was Black. For movement 3 it was White, and during movement 4, only Red attacks were effective against $0. When the music was at its peak, $0 became immune to all types of attacks.
